text: The 1999 Edmonton Eskimos, coached by Don Matthews, finished in third place in the West Division with a 6–12 record. They were defeated in the West Semi- Final by the Calgary Stampeders. == Offseason == === CFL Draft === {| class="wikitable" !Round !Pick !Player !Position !School |- |1 |4 |Trevor Bollers |FB |Iowa
